sense.name: a state of legal authority, power
sense.commentary: JURISDICTION[+state][+social][+authority][+legal] Note: focus is on the legal authority possessed by an entity.
sense.examples: The federal courts have no jurisdiction over this case. (no authority) This will be within the jurisdiction of a military tribunal. (subject to its authority)

sense.name: the place within which an authority has power
sense.commentary: JURISDICTION[+location][+region][+authority][+geographical] Note: refers to physical sectors of a community in which some authority is operative.
sense.examples: The two schools are not in the same tax jurisdiction. (different tax sectors of a town) In that jurisdiction there is a mandatory death sentence for this type of murder.
